items.sentence: Tom is mad at me and I can\'t say I blame him.
Tom has already been questioned by the police.
Tom has always been able to get what he wants.
Tom has been given only twelve months to live.
Tom has enough money to buy anything he wants.
Tom almost always does what he promises to do.
Tom already knows the answer to that question.
Tom always seems to be on the phone with Mary.
Tom always stays in bed until noon on Sundays.
Tom says that he\'s willing to do it for free.
